Sector.Name: Vanguard Reaches
Telehfaeikh
Steblenzh
Sector.Credits: The Vanguard Reaches sector was originally designed by Chuck Kallenbach II and appears in Vanguard Reaches (Paranoia Press, 1981). This version was created by Geir Lanesskog. It is derived from Kallenbachâ€™s 1991 revisions and from the dotmap in MegaTraveller Alien Volume 2: Aslan and Solomani, with considerable modifications to names and locations. This updated version appears in The Spinward Extents (Mongoose Publishing, 2022).
